attributes.name: Joan's Soulfire Torch
attributes.description: "The undead huntress lit aflame her torch as she sought to gather more souls for the taking."
attributes.parsed_description: "The undead huntress lit aflame her torch as she sought to gather more souls for the taking."

attributes.name: Jolly Roger's Rapier
attributes.description: "See my colors fly and know that I come for you."
attributes.parsed_description: "See my colors fly and know that I come for you."

attributes.name: Jolly Sabre
attributes.description: "Oh how happy I am when I am out plundering."
attributes.parsed_description: "Oh how happy I am when I am out plundering."

attributes.name: Jotunbane
attributes.description: "People say that giants are lost to time. I say they live on through the stories we tell."
attributes.parsed_description: "People say that giants are lost to time. I say they live on through the stories we tell."

attributes.name: Journeyman Smith's Battleaxe
attributes.description: "It was not the first axe he had crafted, but it was his finest."
attributes.parsed_description: "It was not the first axe he had crafted, but it was his finest."

attributes.name: Journeyman's Practice Lance
attributes.description: "Jousting is an older art, but it still requires years of training before you have any shot of competing in a tournament."
attributes.parsed_description: "Jousting is an older art, but it still requires years of training before you have any shot of competing in a tournament."

attributes.name: Judgement
attributes.description: "With this strike, you atone."
attributes.parsed_description: "With this strike, you atone."

attributes.name: Judgement of Malevolence
attributes.description: "Those judged were found lacking. And so were given what they lacked, often to great excess."
attributes.parsed_description: "Those judged were found lacking. And so were given what they lacked, often to great excess."

attributes.name: Judgement of Ra
attributes.description: "Ra looked down upon the world and found it needed to be cleansed to start anew."
attributes.parsed_description: "Ra looked down upon the world and found it needed to be cleansed to start anew."

attributes.name: Judgment
attributes.description: "With this strike, you atone."
attributes.parsed_description: "With this strike, you atone."

attributes.name: Jungle Guide
attributes.description: "How do you find out what rustles in the brush? Stab it."
attributes.parsed_description: "How do you find out what rustles in the brush? Stab it."

attributes.name: Junglestrike
attributes.description: "The jungles are my domain. Enter if you dare."
attributes.parsed_description: "The jungles are my domain. Enter if you dare."

attributes.name: Jupiter's Favor
attributes.description: “Lord of the heavens, grant me your boon, that I might smight these unworthy souls.”
attributes.parsed_description: “Lord of the heavens, grant me your boon, that I might smight these unworthy souls.”

attributes.name: Justicar
attributes.description: "To dedicate one's life to defending the helpless, what could be more noble than that?"
attributes.parsed_description: "To dedicate one's life to defending the helpless, what could be more noble than that?"

attributes.name: Keelhaul
attributes.description: "If the blade doesn't get ya, the barnacles will."
attributes.parsed_description: "If the blade doesn't get ya, the barnacles will."

attributes.name: Keen Temper
attributes.description: “Fury seethes in the belly of the beast.”
attributes.parsed_description: “Fury seethes in the belly of the beast.”

attributes.name: Keepbreaker
attributes.description: "All gates give way beneath my might."
attributes.parsed_description: "All gates give way beneath my might."

attributes.name: Keeper's Rapier
attributes.description: "May the watcher guide your path."
attributes.parsed_description: "May the watcher guide your path."

attributes.name: Kent's Grave Trowel
attributes.description: "Technically the bodies don't decompose, but the Azoth residue is quite healthy for the gravebloom."
attributes.parsed_description: "Technically the bodies don't decompose, but the Azoth residue is quite healthy for the gravebloom."

attributes.name: Killer Instinct
attributes.description: "I'm afraid your path ends here."
attributes.parsed_description: "I'm afraid your path ends here."

attributes.name: Kingslayer
attributes.description: "Your reign ends today."
attributes.parsed_description: "Your reign ends today."

attributes.name: Kings's Folly
attributes.description: "This new device will make us powerful as long as we ensure no one else has them."
attributes.parsed_description: "This new device will make us powerful as long as we ensure no one else has them."

attributes.name: Kite Shield
attributes.description: Though it is not without battle scars, this shield is sturdy and will afford significant protection.
attributes.parsed_description: Though it is not without battle scars, this shield is sturdy and will afford significant protection.

attributes.name: Kite Shield
attributes.description: Though it is not without battle scars, this shield is sturdy and will afford significant protection.
attributes.parsed_description: Though it is not without battle scars, this shield is sturdy and will afford significant protection.

attributes.name: Kite Shield
attributes.description: Though it is not without battle scars, this shield is sturdy and will afford significant protection.
attributes.parsed_description: Though it is not without battle scars, this shield is sturdy and will afford significant protection.

attributes.name: Knight Errant
attributes.description: "I'm just passing through, but I have time to help."
attributes.parsed_description: "I'm just passing through, but I have time to help."

attributes.name: Kul'kresh, the Dormant Herald
attributes.description: "I linger and wait for the right time to strike."
attributes.parsed_description: "I linger and wait for the right time to strike."

attributes.name: Lacquered Wood Bow
attributes.description: 2-Handed. A Bow made of Lacquered Wood. Exclusively favors Dexterity for dealing damage. Fires Arrows.
attributes.parsed_description: 2-Handed. A Bow made of Lacquered Wood. Exclusively favors Dexterity for dealing damage. Fires Arrows.

attributes.name: LaCuran's Final Piece
attributes.description: "Willing to listen to all complaints, LaCuran rarely needed to use this musket except in extreme cases."
attributes.parsed_description: "Willing to listen to all complaints, LaCuran rarely needed to use this musket except in extreme cases."

attributes.name: Lamb Slaughter
attributes.description: “You shall be my sacrifice.”
attributes.parsed_description: “You shall be my sacrifice.”

attributes.name: Lane's Lament
attributes.description: "Woe unto me, for my burdens are many. My friends, though, are many more!"
attributes.parsed_description: "Woe unto me, for my burdens are many. My friends, though, are many more!"

attributes.name: Laquered Wood Spear
attributes.description: 2-Handed. A Spear with a Laquered Wood haft. Favors Dexterity for dealing damage, but Strength also contributes. Can be thrown.
attributes.parsed_description: 2-Handed. A Spear with a Laquered Wood haft. Favors Dexterity for dealing damage, but Strength also contributes. Can be thrown.

attributes.name: Last Blow
attributes.description: "The only blow that matters is the one that ends the fight."
attributes.parsed_description: "The only blow that matters is the one that ends the fight."

attributes.name: Last Contact
attributes.description: "They came. We fought. They were gone."
attributes.parsed_description: "They came. We fought. They were gone."

attributes.name: Last Gasp
attributes.description: "The vines pulled him lower and lower into the earth. He shot a flaming arrow up at the tree, hoping for a final chance at life."
attributes.parsed_description: "The vines pulled him lower and lower into the earth. He shot a flaming arrow up at the tree, hoping for a final chance at life."

attributes.name: Last Hope
attributes.description: "We have exhausted all other options. Force is all we have left."
attributes.parsed_description: "We have exhausted all other options. Force is all we have left."

attributes.name: Last Light
attributes.description: "The world changes when the sun dips below the horizon. Things that sleep during the day begin to lurk at night. Carry this weapon with you so that you might see the sun rise again."
attributes.parsed_description: "The world changes when the sun dips below the horizon. Things that sleep during the day begin to lurk at night. Carry this weapon with you so that you might see the sun rise again."

attributes.name: Last Stand
attributes.description: "I may die here today, but I will take you with me."
attributes.parsed_description: "I may die here today, but I will take you with me."

attributes.name: Lavabinder
attributes.description: "Controlling the molten earth is no easy task, but the power it grants is immense."
attributes.parsed_description: "Controlling the molten earth is no easy task, but the power it grants is immense."

attributes.name: Lazarine Cleaver
attributes.description: "The weapons found in the vaults of the Lazarus Pits seem to inherit some of their former master's energy."
attributes.parsed_description: "The weapons found in the vaults of the Lazarus Pits seem to inherit some of their former master's energy."
